summary: This document is a visiting schedule for August 2019 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), detailing morning and evening visitation processing times and unit assignments for specific dates. It appears to be an internal prison schedule, likely relevant as it dates to the month of Jeffrey Epstein's death while in custody.

events.title: MCC Visiting Schedule for August 2019
events.description: A schedule outlining morning and evening visitation processing times and unit assignments for the Metropolitan Correctional Center for the month of August 2019.

keyFacts: The document is a visiting schedule for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) for August 2019.
It specifies that for morning visits, visitors must be processed by 2:45pm, and for evening visits, by 6:45pm.
The schedule details unit assignments (e.g., Unit 2, SHU, Cadre) and timing (Early/Late) for specific dates throughout the month.
The date (August 2019) is significant as it is the month Jeffrey Epstein died while in custody at the MCC.
